RobotCode2015.util

Class MathUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • RobotCode2015.util.MathUtil

  • public class MathUtil
extends Object
    Math IOUtil class for basic math functions, because Java 4 doesn't have arctan, arccos, and arcsin!
    Author:
    Manan Shah, neymikajain

      • linReg

        public static double[] linReg(double[] x,
              double[] y)
        Analyzes data and outputs an array of results Uses logic from the Princeton University Libraries: http://introcs.cs.princeton.edu/java/97data/LinearRegression.java.html
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinates of the data
        y - the y coordinates of the data
        Returns:
        an array that contains Index 0: R^2 value Index 1: beta 1 error value Index 2: beta 0 error value Index 3: yybar value Index 4: residual sum of squares Index 5: regression sum of squares
